sr20x Updated to Steamroller 2014

sr20x.com | 15 Jan 2014

Privateer Press has posted the latest version of thier Steamroller document. Steamroller 2014 brings a number of updates to the missions for the 2014 tournament season

2013 Boost for a Cure

The Retribution of Scyrah, Boost for a Cure | 20 Oct 2013

The two lists that I took to the 2013 Dark Omen Boost for a Cure. The lists took on:

  1. Skorne (Xerxis)
  2. Circle Oboros (Morvana 1)
  3. Circle Oboros (Kromac)
  4. Legion of Everblight (Vayl2)
  5. Khador (Sorcha2)
